Package doa.engine.core

Engine Core.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaCamera
    Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate.
    DoaEngine
    Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
    DoaEngineSettings
    An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...).
    DoaGame  
    DoaGraphicsFunctions
    Responsible for wrapping the Graphics2D class Sun Microsystems provides.
    DoaWindow
    Responsible for being the window for the game.
    DoaWindowSettings
    An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DoaRenderingMode
    Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine.
